summary:
The Central African Republic (CAR) is a country in Central Africa, surrounded by neighbors like Chad, Sudan, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its capital is Bangui. With a population of over 5 million, CAR has been affected by a civil war since 2012.

French and Sango are the official languages. The country has a mix of savannas, forests, and a river system. It was once a French colony and gained independence in 1960. CAR has faced political turmoil, including coups and a history of autocratic rule. Despite its natural resources, it struggles with poverty and low human development. CAR is a member of the United Nations and other international organizations.
title: Central African Republic
